data.name: Ready or Not: Supporter Edition
data.detailed_description:
"SERVARE VITAS" - Conduct operations under the banner of the United States' most elite tactical unit, the FBI's Hostage Rescue Team, with this unique DLC. The Ready Or Not Supporter Edition bundle contains the following:

  • Ready or Not's first expansion pack for free, when it releases.
  • Ready or Not's official soundtrack, upon full release.
  • Access to the game’s experimental Supporter branch
    NOTE: The experimental Supporter branch requires an internet connection to access.

  • Access to the Ready or Not Supporter Discord Server



  • FBI Hostage Rescue Team playermodel
  • HRT Coyote Uniform Variant (Not Available Yet)
  • HRT Multicam Uniform Variant
  • Mk1 Carbine



  • FBI CBRN Gas Mask Headwear



  • FBI "Defender" Tactical Shield



  • "Entryman" 590A Shotgun



  • "PC19" G19 Pistol

data.short_description: Conduct operations under the banner of the United States' most elite tactical unit, the FBI's Hostage Rescue Team, with this unique DLC.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5-1600 / Intel Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Ready or Not © Void Interactive Ltd

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Ready or Not: Supporter Edition

content_descriptors.notes: Given the graphic nature of the game and the gritty realism it portrays, the game is for mature audiences. We will also strongly recommend that people who have experienced personal traumatic events from criminal violence, hostage situations or terrorism refrain from playing. At its core, the game honors the work of dedicated law enforcement officers across the world and in no way intends on glorifying cowardly criminal acts.
